verbose_text: Considering the lower synaptic GluA3 expression in Shisa6 L7 KO and the importance of modification of GluA3 containing AMPAR conductance for PF to PC LTP, we tested the hypothesis that the inability to induce LTP in the Shisa6 L7 KO was caused by the inability of GluA3 containing AMPARs to switch to higher conductance states (XREF_FIG B).
evidence: caused by the inability of GluA3-containing AMPARs
